bibl.title: Report on the Excavation at Abu Mina in Autumn 1989.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: The general plan of the original 5th/6th cent. town. - The earlier settlement of the town. - Excavations in the centre of the town. - Work in the mediaeval settlement (7th-9th cent.).
bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter and Jacek KOSCIUK, Report on the Excavation at Abu Mina in Autumn 1989.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 30 (1991) pp. 65-75, 3 plans et 3 pll.
